name: Materialz
description: Adds new materials: new ores, metals, alloys, cardboard, flax and dyes
author: AmeliaCherry

name: Fancy Jungle
description: Jungle improvements, additionally it contains monstera plant
author: ARGmasterPlay

name: Fancy Willows
description: Few fancy willow tree models around swamp and wetlands

name: Liquids!
description: This mod simply adds crafting recipes allowing you to turn ice, frost, & permafrost into water/magma into lava. Enjoy your liquid builds!
author: Baballerz

name: Industrial Plasteel
description:
A extension to Materialz that adds
a new metal called Industrial Plasteel

Industrial Plasteel is a durable but tricky metal to work with, perfect for those who like trying new combinations for tools!

Recipes:

Sulfur, Zinc Ingot -> 2 Zinc Sulfide
4 Aluminum Ingot, 3 Coal -> 7 Aluminum Carbide
7 Aluminum Carbide, 2 Zinc Sulfide -> Unstable Compound
2 Steel Ingot, Unstable Compound -> 2 Plasteel Compound 
4 Sulfur, Plasteel Compound -> Industrial Plasteel
author: Immortal SpellDagger
